post_message: A Texas veterinarian posted a proud photo to Facebook of herself smiling as she dangled the limp body of a cat she allegedly shot with an arrow. The vet said it was a feral tomcat. People who saw the post were outraged. Now, animal rights activists are pushing for charges.  @webpagelink
